## jx-admin invitation

Accept bot user invitations

***Aliases**: invitations*

### Usage

```
jx-admin invitation
```

### Synopsis

List and accept git repository invitations for the pipeline bot user

### Examples

  # List and accept git repository invitations for the pipeline bot user
  jx-admin invitations

### Options

```
  -h, --help   help for invitation
```
